xqdoc:module.xqdoc:name: annotations.xqm

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:annotations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}global("annotations", "Summary of Annotation use") %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}output("annotations.html", "html5") function _:annotations($model as item()*, $opts as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:anno-calls
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:anno-calls($ns as xs:string, $name as xs:string, $a as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:summary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:summary($model as item()*, $opts as item()*) as element(div)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:toc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:toc($ns as xs:string*) as element(ol)
